name: Leapfrog Technology, Inc.
description:
Leapfrog is a full-stack technology services company that specializes in AI, digital transformation, custom web, and mobile applications. We have designed and delivered over 100 software projects.Â 
Whether you're a big company, or a startup that hopes to be big one day, we commit to being a development partner you can trust to build your next great thing.
We are headquartered in Seattle and have offices in Portland, Boston, and Kathmandu.
